thread.title: Gulf Air Slashes Moscow Fares with July Booking PromoTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Gulf Air Slashes Moscow Fares with July Booking PromoTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Gulf Air Slashes Moscow Fares with July Booking PromoTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Gulf Air slashes Moscow fares with July booking promo
Gulf Air is slashing fares on its 04 weekly flights to and from Moscow for early bird travelers booking flights this month across the airline’s Middle East and Asia network for travel before end December 2015 with return Economy Class fares starting from as low as EUR247 to Dubai, EUR310 to Muscat and EUR323 to Bombay.
Boasting one of the Middle East’s largest networks with double daily flights to over ten cities in the Arabian Gulf region, Gulf Air is well-positioned to connect Moscow to several key destinations in the Middle East and Asia with excellent connectivity via its efficient Bahrain International Airport hub.
Source:- Gulf Air
